About Us

Welcome to Redeeem, the trusted discount gift card exchange.

Started in 2018, Redeeem is a fast, safe and easy way to buy and sell discount gift cards using cryptocurrencies. As a trusted peer-to-peer exchange, we are passionate about Bitcoin and accelerating its adoption into the global economy.

Co-founders Kyle Hill and Mike Townsend.

We believe Bitcoin especially can improve the lives of 2+ billion people around the world who live without a bank account, battle hyperinflation, have distrust for their financial institutions, or need quick (same-day) access to capital. We are empowering a trusted community of gift card traders globally who and are unexpectedly at the helm of the blockchain movement.

For 2+ billion underbanked, gift cards are a gateway into Bitcoin.

All gift cards are backed by a 100% Guarantee to help protect you from fraud and we have a responsive support team available 7 days a week to help you with anything. The average discount for buyers of gift cards on Redeeem is over 20%, so join us today!

Chrome Extension

Chrome Browser Extension

Download our Redeeem Chrome Extension and gain access to real-time gift card inventory, average rates, sale velocity, Bitcoin price and crypto news right from your browser 24 hours a day. It's totally free!

Add to Chrome

A trusted peer-to-peer discount gift card exchange created by Otter Labs.
